definition: a handstand/to turn upside down/to stand on one's head/upside down
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: I stand on my front feet and do a handstand to warn my enemies.
sentences.chinese: 當我警告敵人時，會立起前足倒立。

sentences.english: Sally's party piece is singing whilst standing on her hands.
sentences.chinese: 薩利的派對絕活兒是倒立唱歌。

sentences.english: Then the thesis analyzed the significance of applying unscented kalman filter to inverted pendulum system.
sentences.chinese: 分析無跡卡爾曼濾波算法在倒立擺系統上應用的意義。

sentences.english: He was upside down in a tank of water with chains and lodes all around the lank .
sentences.chinese: 他倒立在一個水箱中，水箱外都盤着鎖鏈。

sentences.english: Rotary and planar inverted pendulums remain the research stage so far.
sentences.chinese: 環形倒立擺和平面倒立擺尚處於實驗室研究階段。

sentences.english: Rotary and planar inverted pendulums remain the research stage so far.
sentences.chinese: 環形倒立擺和平面倒立擺尚處於實驗室研究階段。

sentences.english: These \"upside down\" trees were all the rage last year.
sentences.chinese: 這些是去年風靡一時的“倒立”聖誕樹。

sentences.english: The handstand group gives up the contest because of the training fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 倒立組卻因爲厭倦而放棄比賽。

sentences.english: So we did that, and I practiced walking down the stairs on my hands.
sentences.chinese: 我們就是這麼做的，然後我就練習倒立着下樓。

sentences.english: There are handstands and games to play.
sentences.chinese: 還可以玩手倒立或者別的遊戲呢。

sentences.english: He practised standing on his head and turning somersaults .
When you find your line in Headstand, it's a beautiful thing.
sentences.chinese: 在頭倒立中找到準線是一件非常美好的事情。

sentences.english: Then suddenly he stood on his head and began to sing.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他一下子就倒立起來並唱起歌來了。

sentences.english: Before my accident, I could easily do a headstand .
sentences.chinese: 在我發生意外之前，我可以輕而易舉地倒立。

sentences.english: I caught her ankles as she kicked into a handstand.
sentences.chinese: 她倒立踢騰腿時，我抓穩她的腳踝。

sentences.english: You know I'm going to have to start the handstands with fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎，我打算必須開始練習指尖倒立了。

definition: the splits (move in dancing)/to do the splits/Taiwan pr. [pi3 cha1]
to hang in the air/suspended in midair/(fig.) uncertain
